lead_paragraph: Luca Toni marked his final matchbefore retirement with a goal as relegated Hellas Verona beat Juventus 2-1 on Sunday, handing the Serie A champions their first league defeat since October.

headline.print_headline: Juve Beaten as Toni Bows Out in Style
headline.main: Juve Beaten as Toni Bows Out in Style

snippet: Luca Toni marked his final matchbefore retirement with a goal as relegated Hellas Verona beat Juventus 2-1 on Sunday, handing the Serie A champions their first league defeat since October....
